description: Introduction to basic mathematical and statistical techniques and their applications in a wide range of discipline areas related to plant and animal agriculture.
restricted: Only available to students enrolled in the BEqSc, BVetTech, BWildSc, BSusAgr or the dual BAgribus/BEqSc, BAgribus/BVetTech, BAgribus/BWildSc, BAgribus/BSusAgr programs.
